CustomField.description: 0. all product has no status --> Contact Center 1. No product --> Invalid 2. All Accepted --> Accepted All 3. All Rejected --> Rejected All 4. All New --> New 5. All Pending --> Pending 6. All Invalid --> Invalid 7. Some Accepted --> Accepted Some 8. Some Rejected, no Accepted --> Rejected Some 9. Some Pending, no Accepted/Rejected --> Pending 10. Some New, no Accepted/Rejected/Pending --> New 11. Other scenarios --> New
CustomField.formula: IF( AND(NOT(ISBLANK(RTL_Result_Business__c)), RTL_Number_of_No_Status_NBO__c = RTL_Number_of_Products__c ), $Label.RTL_NBO_Status_ContactCenter , IF(RTL_Number_of_Products__c == 0, $Label.RTL_NBO_Status_Invalid , IF(RTL_Number_of_Products__c == RTL_Number_of_Accepted_NBO__c, $Label.RTL_NBO_Status_Accepted_All , IF(RTL_Number_of_Products__c == RTL_Number_of_Rejected_NBO__c, $Label.RTL_NBO_Status_Rejected_All, IF(RTL_Number_of_Products__c == RTL_Number_of_New_NBO__c, $Label.RTL_NBO_Status_New, IF(RTL_Number_of_Products__c == RTL_Number_of_Pending_NBO__c, $Label.RTL_NBO_Status_Pending, IF(RTL_Number_of_Products__c == RTL_Number_of_Invalid_NBO__c , $Label.RTL_NBO_Status_Invalid, IF(and(RTL_Number_of_Accepted_NBO__c > 0, RTL_Number_of_Invalid_NBO__c == 0), $Label.RTL_NBO_Status_Accepted_Some, IF(RTL_Number_of_Accepted_NBO__c > 0, $Label.RTL_NBO_Status_Accepted_All, IF(and(RTL_Number_of_Rejected_NBO__c > 0, RTL_Number_of_Invalid_NBO__c == 0), $Label.RTL_NBO_Status_Rejected_Some, IF(RTL_Number_of_Rejected_NBO__c > 0, $Label.RTL_NBO_Status_Rejected_All, IF(RTL_Number_of_Pending_NBO__c > 0, $Label.RTL_NBO_Status_Pending, IF(RTL_Number_of_New_NBO__c > 0 , $Label.RTL_NBO_Status_New, $Label.RTL_NBO_Status_New) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Status
